I'm really enjoying this game. Just bought this game because of the sale and I cant stop playing it. Very interesting concept. With that said though I can understand the hate for it. Lobbys can be a mess and takes about 5-10 mins to get one as a killer. It is buggy but as of now i'm pretty happy with it.

*EDIT* 
Few months later the game play is still nice but the community is toxic. Every game expect to be camped by the killer with no hope to be saved. Gets annoying after awhile.

EDIT
Game has become fun again. Lobbies don't take as long and campers are less than they were. I'm proud of the developers for making great changes to the longevity of the game.

EDIT 2021
The Devs don't really care for this game besides the money it prints.

เกมขยะ เกมอัปยศ สร้างความแตกแยก สร้างศัตรู แบ่งฝ่ายโจมตีกัน เปิดโอกาศให้เซอร์ดูถูกเหยียดหยาบ ด่าทอหลังจบเกม ทำให้พวกเซอรโง่ๆที่มาเป็นตี้ 4 คน หาห้องเล่นนานกว่าปกติ เพราะคิลเขาเลิกเล่นกันไปเยอะ หนึ่งในนั้นก็ผมและเพื่อนที่เล่นมาหลายปี ประกาศยุติการเล่นเป็นเกมหลัก เพราะเล่น Killer มันไม่สนุกเหมือนเมื่อก่อน

    ไร้ความสมดุล ปั่นไฟเร็วมาก เป็นเกมที่ฆาตกรโง่ๆ ไล่ฆ่ายอดมนุษย์ ที่ตายยากมากๆ มีทักษะ เอาตัวรอดมากมาย ไม่ว่าจะเป็น แทงหลัง ตายยาก เบอโร่ ทนทายาด และแผ่นไม้ตามแมพที่มีมหาศาลและจุดวนที่แสนจะง่าย กว่าKiller โง่ๆจะไล่ล้มสักคน 1 อาจเสร็จไปหลายเครื่องล่ะ ซึ่งเป็นไปไม่ได้เลยที่ฆาตกรที่ไม่ได้รับการฝึกฝน จะสามารถฆ่าได้ เพราะคนหนังเหนียวสุดๆ ทุกอย่างเอื้ออำนวยให้รอดทั้งสิ้น ถ้าไม่แน่จริงเล่น Killer ไม่ได้ ทำให้คนส่วนใหญ่เล่นเป็นเซอร์ไวเวอร์ จับกลุ่มมาเห่าหอน หลังจากเล่นจบเกม 

*โดนเฉพาะถ้าพวกมันโดนฆ่านะ จะรุมเห่าหอนใส่ Killer ด้วยเหตุผลโง่ๆของปารตี้ขี้แพ้*

[h1][b][u]Dead By Daylight Flexagon Review[/u][/b][/h1]
[b][u]This is an extensive review on the pros and cons this game and its developer made implementations[/u][/b]

As of writing this review I have [b][i]28[/i][/b] hours of experience excluding the 10-12 hours I played in beta, which is well enough to say that this game is fairly fun however filled with an overwhelming amount of bugs; so many to which I might declare the game as unfinished or in an alpha like state. However, when bugs are not encountered the game can be considered fun.

[b][u]PROS[/u][/b]
[list]
    [*]Extremely fun when with friends
    [*]Really emphasizes the horror aspect of the game with the heartbeat sensor
    [*]Variety of killers and survivors to choose from with unique perks
    [*]Procedurally generated maps so that no two maps are the same
    [*]Constant updates adding touches here and there to the game
    [*]Isn't pay to win
    [*]Lots of adrenaline rushes
[/list]

When these pros are in play and the cons are at few then the very best of the game shows however the cons are what make this game sometimes the most frustrating thing in the world.

[b][u]CONS[/u][/b]
[list]
    [*]Bugs Bugs Bugs
    [*]Michael Myers
    [*]Hatch Visibility (An escape route that is near impossible to find)
    [*]The paths intended to juke a killer dont really help. You kinda have to rely on using trees or rocks to hide.
    [*][spoiler]FUCKING MICHAEL MYERS[/spoiler]
    [*]Killers being able to swing their weapon in a 360 degree spin and hit you (Yes you hillbilly)
    [*]Players being able to gesture to the killer where your at (Essentially Griefing)
    [*]Ranked system allowing for new players to be placed against very experienced low ranks (like 10-1)
    [*]No reward if the killer disconnects in a ranked match essentially wasting time
[/list]

Here is a list of bugs I have encountered while playing the game:
[olist]
    [*]Getting stuck in the environment and not being able to move
    [*]Getting pulled off a hook and the killer glitch grabbing, picking up two people at once
    [*]Hillbilly chainsaw 360
    [*][spoiler]Michael Myers[/spoiler] <- Hope that bug gets removed quick
    [*]Character model gliching and strobing around the map while on a hook or the killers back
    [*]Survivors spawning next to the killer essentially ending their trial quickly
[/olist]

Im sure their are many more however I am not here to list every book in the book.
The combo of pros and cons really leave me with a "Mixed" review of this game however, because I indulge in the rush of adrenaline this game provides and its team based composition i'm going to have to give a thumbs up because I can't stop playing it.

[h1]Final Score: [i][u][b]7/10 Hexagons[/b][/u][/i][/h1]

Решился я написать обзор, на данную игру,) Сразу скажу у меня платных игр всего два КС и ДБД, остальные все бесплатные,) Игра атмосферная и местами жуткая, 4 выживших и 1 убийца, бывали моменты когда я подпрыгивал и вздрагивал когда маньяк оказывался сзади или рядом,)) ДБД хороша тем, что ты играешь против такого же человека как и ты. В данный момоент вышло новое ДЛС Хэллуин... Да она неоднозначная, новый маньяк очень опасен,) НО, хочу заметить, что игра является хоррором на выживание, да часто умирать конечно неприятно, но в процессе игры можно научится различным тактикам, хитростям, думать на перед, что брать в лобби, какие перки и расходники,) куда бежать, если вас обнаружат и т.п. ИГРА КЛАССНАЯ! НЕ ЖАЛЕЮ ЧТО КУПИЛ! Хэхэ кемперы горите в аду! ВАХАХАХАХАХа

This game has its potential and I really enjoyed it when it came out. But sadly this game is becoming worse due of developers' "balance" change and stuff. Many people say they are doing great job and I do believe they really care for this game and working hard on it. However, it turns out this game is not heading to the direction I hoped and it is no longer a horror game as it first seems to be. 

Yes I am not a pro player as those Twitch streamers are but I have played both survivors and killers and they are not as fun as they used to be. They did fixed some annoying things like infinite jukes and stuff but also nerfed many things on BOTH sides which lowers my interest to this game.

I really wanted to say yes to this game but sorry just like many other game the developers ruin what they created.

Não recomendo o jogo.
O jogo já foi bom, porem, atualmente, não vale a pena pelo seu preço e por alguns pontos que irei citar agora.
Primeiramente, a empresa responsável pelo jogo atualmente só esta visando lucros, como por exemplo, nesta atualização um "Assassino" mega robado, porém para obte-lo são 13 reais, e este assassino no qual me refiro tem varias vantagens em comparação aos outros, resumindo, quem paga se sobresai e quem não tem paga se fode no jogo.
Outro ponto negativo é a famosa "panelinha", jogar este jogo solo é praticamente impossível, pois em toda partida sempre tem alguma dupla ou grupo de amigos, que no qual, nunca irão lhe ajudar caso você seja pego ou coisa do tipo.
Enfim, atualmente o jogo não vale a pena comprar, pelo seu "alto" preço e por seus pontos negativos serem mais "fortes" do que seus pontos positivos.

Love the idea and in theory this is a great game but in my experience this game has been unplayable due to bugs and lag. I have followed all the online guides into how to improve performance, I've changed the settings and the game cache and am running it on the lowest possible settings just so that it can function fps-wise. But even still, a bug just took me out of the game, and even with the lowest settings and the uninstallation of other things from my computer, the fps was so low that skill checks were reduced to a total potluck - no matter how quickly I responded, the game would take a few extra seconds to process my action and I was unable to successfully complete more than half. The programming on this game needs to be polished severely or it'll just be another wasted potential.

Game was great! Then they adde Michael meyers... THE GAME FUCKING SUCKS NOW

I never bothered to write a review, but I felt so ripped off by this game(on sale...) that I had to speak my mind about it.

   My honest opinion is this game is not worth the money, not even on sales. It's an extremely low quality product, and the developers are greedy bastards that focus on putting out more cosmetic shit for people to buy, instead of fixing blatantly obvious technical and balance problems. I know this because I bought the game on release, and now, months later, it still didn't fix any of it's major technical problems, but they found the time to roll out overpriced skins at least once a month.

   The 3 biggest (but not the only) technical problems are:
 - Piss-poor optimization. I can run the latest blockbusters at 60FPS in 1080p, but this game, which is nowhere near the visual quality of those, is unplayable even on low settings at that resolution.
 - NO TRUE FULL SCREEN OPTION!!! I shit you not. As if it wasn't enough that it's optimized like shit, you don't even have the option to run it in true full screen, only borderless window.
 - Broken lobby system. Sometimes, you have to restart the game completely to even be able to join a game.

   I won't even go into the balance issues of it, because I'm writing a review, not a novel. Just know that this game is a huge grind if you want to get any decent perks for your characters, like old school MMO-huge. I have 40+ hours on record and I'm not even half-way to max level, out of a total of 12 characters... To make things worse, the perks you get are random, except for your character-specific ones.

   You have been warned.

Bonjour amateur de survival!!!

Se que je pense personnelement de ce jeu:

Une beta tu le restera, des bugs à creuvés malgré un bon concept mais la communauté le pourit fièrement (j'éxplique le pourquoi un peu plus bas), 

il n'est pas très bien équilibré, quelques maps sont trop petites et d'autres trop grandes, des tueurs ou survivants un trop forts et d'autres beaucoups moins skillés du aux perks perso re-équilibré avec le market... 

Petit outch pour en revenir à cette comunauté de naze troll et autres, quelques glitcheurs mon foutu un peu les boules tout comme le alt + f4 (qui certe ne fait gagner aucuns point, ou xp, mais redonne le stuff moins l'ofrande), les mecs se font choper se deco instant me trou le cul car fait perdre beaucoup de temps aux survivants et en ganer au tueurs...
Manque de missions et de challenge quand cela devient répétitif, les quelques missions "journalières" ne le sont pas vraiment, pourtant fini depuis 6 jours, si pour eux "jounalière" dure 1 semaine omg la traduction...

8/10 pour les graphismes et les effets graphiques,
7/10 pour l'équilibrage des personnages/tueurs
9/10 pour l'ajout de contenu en tout genres
6/10 pour les skins
6/10 pour le nombres d'objets
4/10 pour le challenge/ les missions
3/10 pour les glitchs et bugs non corigé
...

Un peu rébarbatif sur les possibilitées de survie, fuite (que des générateurs à se taper ou la trape pour le dèrnier survivant) sa fait très peu pour réelement acrocher se jeu à long therme, il faudrait bien plus d'échapatoires, comme le nombre de possibilitées pour le tueur de choper de la viande fraiche reste très faible vs une équipe bien rodée...

A bientot!

I've never written a review for anything before, until now. This game was amazing and one of my favorites, till the recent Michael Myers update. Michael myers pretty much ruined the game. I don't think I'll try playing it again till they fix him or completly remove him from the game. I use to recomend friends to buy this game, but I'll recomend not to buy it for now. At least till they do something about Michael Myers. If you do go ahead and buy this game anyways, you'll need to buy the Michael  Myers DLC with it to have any fun.
Honestly I enjoyed this game right? But now it is a pile of dogshit. Just don't get it. It was fun before, no longer fun. The devs have gone and ruined their own game, and keep doign so.
